page.title: 01HOUSING
page.content: There are three types of houses in the area we chose for our survey.These are{council}(40%),{newly built houses} (24%) and{old pre-war houses }(36%). Gone are the days when an inside toilet was considered a modern convenience.Today (52%) have {central {heating},(95%) have{washing machines}, (79%) have{telephones}and (56%) have {videos.} Most houses have three bedrooms,a lounge,a dining room,a bathroom,a kitchen,a hall and a loft. Each room is carpeted and the walls are normally covered with wallpaper.Most rooms are extensively furnished which as well as being attractive is also comfortable.
